description: Manolo Blahnik Hangisi flats in blush satin

core:description.text: The beloved Manolo Blahnik Hangisi flats reimagined in a soft blush satin. A sparkling crystal buckle crowns the pointed toe, catching the light with every graceful step, while the flat profile keeps them comfortable through receptions and waltzes alike. An instant icon for city hall ceremonies and couture skirt suits.
